scripts.extract-i18n-terms:recipient: yarn workspace @parallel/bin extract-i18n-terms --cwd '../server' --locales ca it pt --input '../server/src/emails/emails/recipient/**/*.{ts,tsx}' '../server/src/pdf/documents/recipient/**/*.{ts,tsx}' '../server/lang/recipient-additional-terms.ts' --output '../server/lang' --exclude-pragma no-recipient
scripts.generate-i18n-files:recipient: yarn workspace @parallel/bin generate-i18n-files --locales ca it pt --input '../server/lang' --output-compiled '../server/lang/compiled'
scripts.download-countries-i18n: yarn workspace @parallel/bin download-cldr-data --dataset country-names --locales en es ca it pt --output '../server/data/countries/countries_#LOCALE#.json'
scripts.download-currencies-i18n: yarn workspace @parallel/bin download-cldr-data --dataset currency-names --locales en es ca it pt --output '../server/data/currencies/currencies_#LOCALE#.json'
scripts.download-document-fonts: yarn workspace @parallel/bin download-fonts --output '../client/public/static/fonts/pdf' --output-manifest '../client/utils/fonts.json' '../server/src/pdf/utils/fonts.json' --fonts  'IBM Plex Sans' 'Roboto Slab' 'Merriweather' 'Playfair Display' 'Lora' 'PT Serif' 'Source Serif 4@Source Serif Pro' 'IBM Plex Serif' 'Cormorant Garamond' 'Alegreya' 'Tinos' 'Libre Baskerville' 'Noto Serif' 'Roboto' 'Open Sans' 'Lato' 'Montserrat' 'Poppins' 'Source Sans 3@Source Sans Pro' 'Noto Sans' 'Raleway' 'Nunito' 'Rubik' 'Parisienne' 'Rubik Wet Paint' 'Inconsolata'
scripts.download-international-fonts: yarn workspace @parallel/bin download-fonts --output '../client/public/static/fonts/pdf' --output-manifest '../server/src/pdf/utils/international_fonts.json' --fonts 'Noto Sans '{Myanmar,Arabic,Hebrew,Georgian,SC,KR,Devanagari,Armenian,Khmer,JP,Kannada,'Canadian Aboriginal',Ethiopic,Bengali,Thai,Tamil,Lao,Sinhala,'Ol Chiki',Tifinagh,Yi,Syriac,Thaana,Vai,Cherokee,'Tai Tham','Tai Viet',Javanese,Telugu,Gujarati,Malayalam,Gurmukhi} 'Noto Serif Tibetan@Noto Sans Tibetan' 'Noto Emoji'
